Eru bụ ofe sitere na obodo Cameroon
Ọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche nke ndị Bayangi, nke mpaghara Manyu na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Cameroon
Ọ bụ ofe akwụkwọ nri nke e ji akwụkwọ eru maọbụ okok gbutuo nke ọma were mee
A na-eji akwụkwọ mmiri maọbụ spinach, mmanụ nkwụ, crayfish, na azụ amiri n’ anwụrụ ọkụ, akpụkpọ ehi (kanda) maọbụ anụ ehi sie eru.
E ji mmiri-fufu maọbụ garri were na-eri nri a
